the_different_unlocked_rights_for_vip_me: The different unlocked rights for VIP members
as_you_progress_to_the_highest_possible_: As you progress to the highest possible rank in our VIP Club, you unlock various rights that improve your OK.PLAY experience. The higher your level in the VIP tiers, the more privileges you can enjoy. Learn more about them below:
unlocking_the_roll_competition_at_v_03_w: Unlocking the Roll Competition at V03 will allow you to spin the dice and potentially win bonus!
win_all_14_secret_treasures_scattered_th: Win all 14 Secret Treasures scattered throughout the levels when you complete your VIP journey. The higher your VIP ranking, the better your prizes will be! Open your first Secret Treasure at V04.
no_need_to_switch_channels_to_share_your: No need to switch channels to share your experiences with other players! Chat privately with your fellow VIP players and socialise here at OK.PLAY. Unlock this feature when you reach V04.
keep_an_eye_out_for_rain_rewards_in_the_: Keep an eye out for rain rewards in the chat room! You can access this random reward when you reach V04. It occurs every 6 hours and rewards a variety of prizes.
at_v_07_you_can_win_random_crypto_coins_: At V07, you can win random crypto coins while staying in the chatroom. Socialise with other players and get lucky when free coins begin to drop!
if_you_wish_to_share_your_luck_and_good_: If you wish to share your luck and good wishes with other players, you may transfer funds from your account to theirs. Who knows, you might even receive tips for yourself as well. Get this feature at V08.
sending_photos_and_gifs_in_the_ok_play_c: Sending photos and gifs in the OK.PLAY chat becomes available for players at V08! Express yourself freely in the chat room and make your time at OK.PLAY more entertaining.
coco_is_an_adorable_orange_alligator_tha: COCO is an adorable orange alligator that likes to roam around OK.PLAY. Spot him at the right time every 6 hours and win a bonus! Be rewarded for your hunting skills at V14.
whenever_you_make_win_or_lose_bets_you_q: Whenever you make, win or lose bets, you qualify for a Rakeback bonus, which returns a 20% commission to maximise your funds! Get some of your money back at V14.
you_can_also_get_an_rb_booster_that_incr: You can also get an RB Booster that increases your Rakeback bonus by 5% every hour. Unlock this at V14.
when_you_reach_v_22_you_can_exchange_jb_: When you reach V22, you can exchange JB cryptocurrency at the OK.PLAY platform with zero withdrawal fees.
the_final_level_of_the_unlocked_rights_i: The final level of the unlocked rights is Recharge! You have the chance to claim free cashback bonuses as often as every 10 minutes when you reach V22.

reaching_the_svip_rank_will_give_you_acc: Reaching the SVIP rank will give you access to a VIP host and receive special codes to get more perks and rewards.
vip_members_deserve_lots_of_thrilling_su: VIP members deserve lots of thrilling surprises. One hint about this secret reward: the higher your rank, the better your treasure will be! Thanks to our Secret Treasures, you can look forward to getting special bonuses on the regular.

another_benefit_that_svip_members_can_ex: Another benefit that SVIP members can expect is the SVIP Trip, which gives you the chance to get all-expense paid trips to fabulous corners of the globe!
